attributes.action: Insist that all Operating systems have anti Child pornography software written into the program
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If Operating systems were written to include anti child pornography / hatred / terrorism software, that prevented users from uploading, downloading, or even viewing content considered to be against the law, then it becomes more difficult for the  perpetrators to sell their images. 
Sure the problem will not disappear over night, if at all, but this will no doubt slow it down.
And as far as freedom, look, the only people who complain about not being able to view the afore mentioned subjects on the internet, are the sick individuals commiting such crimes, and they belong in jail ( because any harsher comments will only result in this petition being removed ).
If you are reading this, you are eigther one of them, or one of us, ... , you decide.

Thank you for listening
